title: Documentation - View the virtual network
abstract:
# Documentation - View the virtual network
Each organization in Google Distributed Cloud Hosted (GDCH) has its own isolated virtual network. An organization has two different IP ranges: an internal range and an external range. To view these IP ranges in the GDCH console, follow these steps:
- Sign in to the GDCH console.
- Click **Menu** .
- In the **Networking** section, click **Virtual Network** .
- View the table to see the internal and external IP ranges for the default virtual network of this organization
